catalogId.description: Identifier for the Data Catalog. By default, it is the account ID of the caller.

columnNames.description: Set of column names for the table. At least one of `column_names` or `excluded_column_names` is required.

databaseName.description: Name of the database for the table with columns resource. Unique to the Data Catalog.

excludedColumnNames.description: Set of column names for the table to exclude. At least one of `column_names` or `excluded_column_names` is required.

name.description:
Name of the table resource.

The following arguments are optional:

wildcard.description: Whether to use a wildcard representing every table under a database. At least one of `name` or `wildcard` is required. Defaults to `false`.
